Class Fulfillment

java.lang.Object
  ca.cmput301.team13.taskman.model.BackedObject
      ca.cmput301.team13.taskman.model.Fulfillment
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<BackedObject>
public class Fulfillment
extends BackedObject
implements java.io.Serializable

Represents a fulfillment to a task requirement; aggregated by Requirement.
